page.title: 05Why we live in Grendon.
page.content: My family came to live in this area because my dad got a new job, and to get the job we had to move nearer to where he works. We didn't have to live in Buckinghamshire, but when we were looking for houses we looked in Buckinghamshire, and decided we liked the area. We ended up living in Grendon Underwood because we wanted to go and look at another house and we passed the house,that I live at now.We liked the house and after a while we bought it. I moved to this area last January and it is now the beginning of July and so I have not lived in this area very long. My dads job is to check the people that build roads.
